  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExpandableListAdapter, HeterogeneousExpandableList

    public class FilterCateg_ExpandableListAdapter
extends BaseExpandableListAdapter
    Expandable list of categories to be used in Filters Activity
    Author:
    Dimitrios Ververidis for the Multimedia Group (http://mklab.iti.gr).
